name: Space Invasion (Dan Roman)
description:
Space Invasion is a game created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

I created this game in pygame and this was also the first time me coding in python.

The outer space is getting destroyed by a black hole and you are not alone during this. Many other space ships will fly from the sky and you have to avoid them or you will get bonked into the black hole.

Controls : Space to jump.

Score : To collect score you can destroy other ships by going into them or you can just wait until they go off screen.

Powerups : You can buy powerups by clicking on them or press "E" for the first one, "Q" for the second one and "R" for the third one.

The code can be changed if you open the folder in a text editing software.

The sprites can be changed too by editing them inside the data folder.

Have Fun!
